programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas agrees to do a good deed for Pop, the town drunk who is dying, by going along with a story that his ranch is owned by Pop. When Pop's son, Philip, arrives from back east the story backfires and now his son wants restitution.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A dance hall singer asks for Lucas' help in hiding her 6-month-old baby girl from her estranged, self-righteous husband after he comes to town demanding she give the baby to him. Lucas must deal with the consequences of safeguarding the infant.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: After his friend passes away, Cheyenne becomes the marshal of Cripple Creek. Disgusted by all the corruption in the small town, he resigns. His successor arrives but may need Cheyenne's help to keep the peace.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne travels to Emmetville for his friend's wedding. When he arrives in town, he finds out that his friend is missing. Suspicious arise around the tight-lipped Emmet family and the bride-to-be who doesn't seemed concerned of his whereabouts.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The cowboys team up to wrangle dangerous long-horned cattle for a fellow rancher. Working with Bubba's feisty new colt, Booger schools his over-confident apprentice on the skills of training horses. The steakhouse plans gallop ahead with the cowboys taking lessons to learn more about the industry. Cody polishes his etiquette and studies the proper way to set a table, Bubba becomes Chef Thompson after a professional cook turns up the heat in the kitchen, and Booger partners with a butcher to sharpen his knowledge of beef. When their equipment fails, Cody and Misty unload new cow pens the old-fashioned way. When he gets the okay from his chiropractor, a relieved Bubba jumps back on his horse and rides off into the sunset with Kaley.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The cowboys team up to get their new herd feed-broke, but a stuck truck means super-mom, super-secretary Kaley has to save the day. Horse expert Booger teaches a young polo player how to ride western style, but after she challenges him to join her on the polo field, who's really getting schooled? Bubba and Kaley anxiously wait to share their daughter's first steps. To get more family time, Cody and Misty do a drive-thru date on horseback, and he clears the family fishing hole to lift his ailing Paw-Paw's spirits. And, after their crash course in cooking, one final taste test determines if Chef Bill will partner up with the cowboys to keep their restaurant dreams alive. They present their best dishes to some of the toughest critics they'll ever meet: their wives.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark find a wounded man and bring him into North Fork to save his life. Lucas asks Simon Battle, a gunfighter-turned-doctor, to help the man. The wounded man's enemies have other plans in store.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A Chinese man named Wang Chi and his son, Wang Lee, come to North Fork to open a laundry service in town. Vince Fergus, a prejudiced man, bullies them but Micah, Lucas, and Milly try to convince them to stay. A fight between Fergus and Lucas ensues.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.sub-title: John Wesley Hardin: Killer on the Texas Frontier
programme.desc: When outlaw John Wesley Hardin murders a sheriff, a hard-charging Texas Ranger joins forces with a cool-headed police detective to hunt the killer. The unlikely duo must learn how to work together to end Hardin's reign of terror once and for all.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.sub-title: Wong Fee Lee Stakes His Claim
programme.desc: Chinese immigrant Wong Fee Lee joins a convoy of miners headed to Deadwood, where he hopes to strike gold and start a business. But when the Black Hills Bandits stand in their way, Wong must find the strength to lead his fellow prospectors in battle.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: Jim Beckwourth lives a life of adventure as a trapper, trader and adopted member of the Crow tribe. When America goes to war, Beckwourth becomes an army dispatch rider, a job that puts him and a young greenhorn on a collision course with the Pawnee.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: The thirteen remaining cowboys face their first immunity challenge that tests their individual skills. The contestants race to score the fastest time in barrel racing and calf roping. While most cowboys impress Trace and the judges, only one will be safe from the next elimination. For the team challenge, the cowboys take on a group of untrained horses that they have to break, saddle, and ride. In the end, it all comes down to strategy, and the team that thinks ahead takes the win. After a few choice words, teammates lock horns, determined to out-cowboy the other. When an unexpected cowboy heads home, the rest of the contestants realize every move they make counts in this competition.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: As tensions rise between the North and the South, the Army recruits the Kid to infiltrate a band of Southern rebel guerrillas led by a man known as the Hawk.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas agrees to ride shotgun on a stagecoach carrying $20,000 in gold for North Fork banker John Hamilton after a man fails to show up. When three men rob the stage and take Mark hostage, Lucas must get both the gold and Mark back safely.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Marshal Micah Torrance arrests infamous outlaw Brett Stocker and deputizes Lucas McCain into duty so he can transport the outlaw to another town. When Stocker's gang ambush Torrance and send a letter to Lucas with demands, Lucas must act quickly.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas agrees to do a good deed for Pop, the town drunk who is dying, by going along with a story that his ranch is owned by Pop. When Pop's son, Philip, arrives from back east the story backfires and now his son wants restitution.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A dance hall singer asks for Lucas' help in hiding her 6-month-old baby girl from her estranged, self-righteous husband after he comes to town demanding she give the baby to him. Lucas must deal with the consequences of safeguarding the infant.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: After his friend passes away, Cheyenne becomes the marshal of Cripple Creek. Disgusted by all the corruption in the small town, he resigns. His successor arrives but may need Cheyenne's help to keep the peace.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne travels to Emmetville for his friend's wedding. When he arrives in town, he finds out that his friend is missing. Suspicious arise around the tight-lipped Emmet family and the bride-to-be who doesn't seemed concerned of his whereabouts.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The guys saddle up to rope in a renegade heifer before she tears up a neighbor's field. Booger creates a birthday to remember for his 85-year-old grandma, including her first ride in a convertible, a photo shoot and a huge surprise party with a special guest. Cody goes on a personal publicity tour to promote the opening of their pop-up restaurant. On the eve of their big opening, the neglected details could turn the cowboys' restaurant dream into a nightmare. Bubba forgets a key ingredient, Cody's efforts bring in an unexpected number of hungry customers, and they run out of their signature steak. It's a night to make the guys wonder if they'd be better off just sticking to The Cowboy Way of life they love.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: It's a rope-swinging episode of The Cowboy Way! After their restaurant venture, each of the cowboys takes some quality time to reconnect with family and discuss their futures. Cody decides to make the ranch high-tech, but will it be a success or will he get his wires crossed? Bubba plays locksmith for Booger's truck. A missing cow gets stuck in the woods. The guys use Booger's annual horse clinic as a way to give back to the community. And get ready for matchmaking the cowboy way! When the boys set up a mixer for bachelors Frankie and Hodge, speed-dating turns into a literal horse race to win the ladies' affections.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mexican bandits attack Lucas and Mark for crossing their desert without paying. The group steals their horses, kidnaps Mark, and leaves Lucas to die in the desert. Lucas gets free and trails the banditos to a small village.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Against Lucas' wishes, Mark gets a job at the livery stable in town. Lucas has doubts that Mark can both work and get his chores done on time. Mark finds himself in trouble when he takes a shortcut on an errand and meets a dangerous bank robber.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.sub-title: Law Comes to No Man's Land
programme.desc: Marshal Chris Madsen helps newly appointed judge John Buford bring law and order to Oklahoma's Panhandle in an area known as No Man's Land. After escorting a wagon train of prisoners to Beaver City, they set up their first courthouse inside a saloon.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: When bandits rob a train and gun down a pursuing marshal, they spark one of the largest manhunts in California history. After taking shelter behind the crumbling walls of Stone Corral, they make their final stand against a hail of gunfire.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: Heading west as a young adventurer, greenhorn Jim Baker quickly develops a reputation as a skilled marksman and mountain man. When a party of trappers is surrounded and attacked by Cheyenne and Arapaho warriors, Baker proves that he is also a leader.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: The twelve remaining cowboys saddle up for another immunity challenge - tournament-style pasture roping. The contestant who ropes and tie-downs a steer the fastest won't be on the chopping block during the next elimination. Guest judge, eight-time PRCA Champion Fred Whitfield, joins Trace and the other judges to help narrow down the immunity buckle winner. The cowboys compete in a grueling relay race for the elimination challenge that tests their horsemanship and showcases various riding skills. The relay race takes its toll on a contestant's horse, slowing down the blue team. After an avoidable mistake, the green team suspects one of their own of sabotage. Trace ups the ante, sending two cowboys home and leaving the rest in shock.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: Jimmy joins the Kid in infiltrating the Hawk's gang. Meanwhile, as the Civil War nears, Sweetwater becomes an embattled town as townspeople must take up arms against the renegades.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: George Collins, a meek young man who loves to write, moves west for adventure. However, he is soon fired as a trail cook and beaten up by trailhands. Lucas takes George under his wing to help him discover his true qualities and inner strength.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark overhears men plotting to rob the North Fork Bank while at a surveying camp and tells Lucas about what he heard. When Lucas questions his story, Mark runs away from home. Lucas later learns Mark was telling the truth and helps capture the men.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A famous old frontiersman, with a reputation as the best rifleman around, challenges Luke to see who's really the best with a rifle.
